  18. (* Marshal and unmarshal a compilation unit in linear format *)
  19. ‌type linear_item_info =
  20.   | Func of Linear.fundecl
  21.   | Data of Cmm.data_item list

  23. ‌type linear_unit_info =
  24.   {
  25.     mutable unit_name : string;
  26.     mutable items : linear_item_info list;
  27.     mutable for_pack : string option
  28.   }

  30. ‌type error =
  31.   | Wrong_format of string
  32.   | Wrong_version of string
  33.   | Corrupted of string
  34.   | Marshal_failed of string

  36. exception Error of error

  38. ‌let save filename linear_unit_info =
  39.   let ch = open_out_bin filename in
  40.   Misc.try_finally (fun () ->
  41.     output_string ch Config.linear_magic_number;
  42.     output_value ch linear_unit_info;
  43.     (* Saved because Linearize and Emit depend on Cmm.label. *)
  44.     output_value ch (Cmm.cur_label ());
  45.     (* Compute digest of the contents and append it to the file. *)
  46.     flush ch;
  47.     let crc = Digest.file filename in
  48.     output_value ch crc
  49.   )
  50.     ~always:(fun () -> close_out ch)
  51.     ~exceptionally:(fun () -> raise (Error (Marshal_failed filename)))

  53. let restore filename =
  54.   let ic = open_in_bin filename in
  55.   Misc.try_finally
  56.     (fun () ->
  57. ‌       let magic = Config.linear_magic_number in
  58. ‌       let buffer = really_input_string ic (String.length magic) in
  59.        if String.equal buffer magic then begin
  60.          try
  61. ‌           let linear_unit_info = (input_value ic : linear_unit_info) in
  62. ‌           let last_label = (input_value ic : Cmm.label) in
  63.            Cmm.reset ();
  64.            Cmm.set_label last_label;
  65. ‌           let crc = (input_value ic : Digest.t) in
  66.            linear_unit_info, crc
  67.          with End_of_file | Failure _ -> raise (Error (Corrupted filename))
  68.             | Error e -> raise (Error e)
  69.        end
  70.        else if String.sub buffer 0 9 = String.sub magic 0 9 then
  71.          raise (Error (Wrong_version filename))
  72.        else
  73.          raise (Error (Wrong_format filename))
  74.     )
  75.     ~always:(fun () -> close_in ic)

  77. (* Error report *)

  79. open Format

  81. ‌let report_error ppf = function
  82.   | Wrong_format filename ->
  83.       fprintf ppf "Expected Linear format. Incompatible file %a"
  84.         Location.print_filename filename
  85.   | Wrong_version filename ->
  86.       fprintf ppf
  87.         "%a@ is not compatible with this version of OCaml"
  88.         Location.print_filename filename
  89.   | Corrupted filename ->
  90.       fprintf ppf "Corrupted format@ %a"
  91.         Location.print_filename filename
  92.   | Marshal_failed filename ->
  93.       fprintf ppf "Failed to marshal Linear to file@ %a"
  94.         Location.print_filename filename

  96. let () =
  97.   Location.register_error_of_exn
  98.     (function
  99.       | Error err -> Some (Location.error_of_printer_file report_error err)
  100.       | _ -> None
  101.     )
